## Minneapolis Spatial Analysis

Welcome to the Minneapolis Spatial Analysis project website.

This project examines spatial patterns and relationships in Minneapolis using advanced spatial regression techniques.

### Project Overview

This website documents the analysis of spatial data in Minneapolis, including:

- Spatial regression modeling
- Principal components analysis
- Local Indicators of Spatial Association (LISA)
- Election data analysis

### Navigation

Use the navigation menu above to explore different sections of the project:

- **About**: Project description and background
- **Methods**: Methodology and analytical approach
- **Results**: Findings and visualizations
